element.name: Red Mook
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: An adorable slime companion, this one is colored red.

ul.li: Condition Immunities Blinded, Charmed, Deafened, Exhaustion, Frightened, Prone
Languages Understands the languages you speak
Challenge — Proficiency Bonus equals your bonus.

description.p: Love. Loves the last person that held it unconditionally.
Multiply. When fed 8gp worth of red food and water will grow and split into 2 seperate creatures over 1 day.

Explosion. When killed will violently explode into a 10ft by 10ft square, painting everything within red. If thrown the mook will take 1 damage upon landing. Any creature that ends their turn within the 10ft by 10ft square will take 1 point of fire damage.
